SEARCH
Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.analysis

Class AttDeque

java.lang.Object
com.github.oeuvres.alix.util.Roller
com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.analysis.AttDeque
public class AttDeque extends Roller
A fixed size collection of lucene AttributeSource, allowing insertion and removal at both ends, a bit like a Deque. This class is used in the context of a TokenFilter, to record states needed by forward lookup or backward lookup (ex: concatenation of expressions). This deque do not inherits from Collection framework, because in the context of a lucene analysis process, values of attributes like the actual token are volatile and needs to be copied AttributeSource.copyTo(AttributeSource) else where to be kept.
